00489 
00496   class MESQUITE_EXPORT MeshDomainAssoc
00497   {
00498   public:
00499 
00514     MeshDomainAssoc(Mesquite::Mesh* mesh, 
00515                     Mesquite::MeshDomain* domain, 
00516                     bool full_compatibility_check=false,
00517                     bool proceed=false,
00518                     bool skip_compatibility_check=false)
00519        : mMesh(mesh), mMeshDomain(domain), mesh_and_domain_are_compatible(false)
00520     {
00521         // check for real instance.  If either value is NULL then it's just an 
00522         // instance created to facilitate passing of just a mesh or domain
00523         // also, check if skipping the compatibility check was requested
00524       if (mesh && domain && !skip_compatibility_check)
00525       {
00526         MsqError err;
00527         double tolerance = 1.0e-3;
00528 
00529         std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vert_handles;
00530         mMesh->get_all_vertices( vert_handles, err );     
00531 
00532         MsqVertex mesh_vertex, domain_vertex;
00533         Vector3D normal;
00534 
00535         double distance; 
00536         std::vector<int>::size_type i, times_to_loop;
00537         if (full_compatibility_check)
00538           times_to_loop = vert_handles.size();
00539         else
00540           times_to_loop = 1;
00541         mesh_and_domain_are_compatible = true;
00542         for (i = 0; i < times_to_loop; ++i) 
00543         {
00544           mMesh->vertices_get_coordinates(&vert_handles[i], 
00545                                           &mesh_vertex,
00546                                           1,
00547                                           err);     
00548           mMeshDomain->closest_point( vert_handles[i],
00549                                       Vector3D(mesh_vertex),
00550                                       domain_vertex,
00551                                       normal,
00552                                       err ); 
00553 
00554         distance = Vector3D::distance_between(mesh_vertex, domain_vertex);
00555         if ( distance > tolerance )
00556         {
00557           mesh_and_domain_are_compatible = false;
00558           std::cout << "Warning: Mesh and Domain are not compatibile" << std::endl;
00559           if (!proceed)
00560           {
00561             std::cout << "Terminating due to Mesh/Domain incompatibility" << std::endl;
00562             throw "Terminating due to Mesh/Domain incompatibility";
00563           }
00564           break;   // exits for loop when not compatbile but should not terminate
00565         }
00566       }
00567     }
00568   }
00569 
00570 
00571     ~MeshDomainAssoc() {};
00572    
00573   
00578     Mesquite::Mesh* get_mesh()
00579     {
00580       return mMesh;
00581     };
00582    
00583 
00588     Mesquite::MeshDomain* get_domain()
00589     {
00590       return mMeshDomain;
00591     };
00592 
00593 
00594   private:
00595     Mesquite::Mesh* mMesh;
00596     Mesquite::MeshDomain* mMeshDomain;
00597     bool mesh_and_domain_are_compatible;
00598 
00599   public:
00600 
00601     bool are_compatible()
00602     {
00603       return mesh_and_domain_are_compatible;
00604     };
00605 
00606   };
00607 }
00608 
00609 inline size_t Mesquite::vertices_in_topology(Mesquite::EntityTopology topo)
00610 {
00611   return TopologyInfo::corners( topo );
00612 }
